n0:createSxmlObject.n0:source: <VIEW xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/ku" version="1.0"> <SCHEMA>HR</SCHEMA> <NAME>DEPARTMENTS</NAME> <EDITIONING_VIEW></EDITIONING_VIEW> <DEFAULT_COLLATION>USING_NLS_COMP</DEFAULT_COLLATION> <COL_LIST> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>DEPARTMENT_ID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>DEPARTMENT_NAME</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>MANAGER_ID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>LOCATION_ID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> </COL_LIST> <SUBQUERY>SELECT department_id, department_name, manager_id, location_id FROM departments$0</SUBQUERY> </VIEW>
